Ensalada de Lentejas con Espinacas y Zan: Lentil Salad with Spinach and Carrots
Esta ensalada es una opción saludable y: This salad is a healthy and protein-packed option. Lentils are mixed with fresh spinach, grated carrots, and a light dressing, offering a nutritious, flavorful, and textured dish.
Un plato clásico y reconfortante, la ens: A classic and comforting dish, potato salad combines boiled potatoes with mayonnaise, onion, hard-boiled eggs, and a touch of mustard, creating a creamy and delicious mixture. Ideal as a side dish or a light main course.
Atún a la Plancha con Pesto de Aguacate: Grilled Tuna with Avocado Pesto and Vegetables
Un plato ligero y sabroso, el atún a la: A light and flavorful dish, grilled tuna is served with creamy avocado pesto, accompanied by sautéed vegetables. It's a perfect combination of lean protein, healthy fats, and fresh vegetables.
Un clásico de la cocina italiana, fácil: A classic of Italian cuisine, easy and delicious. It consists of spaghetti accompanied by a mix of olive oil, garlic, and chili, creating a simple yet flavorful taste. Perfect for a quick and light meal.
Una versión deliciosa de los tradicional: A delicious version of the traditional al pastor tacos, but with chicken marinated in achiote and pineapple. Served in corn tortillas with fresh cilantro and a hint of lime, offering a vibrant and fresh flavor.
Un plato refrescante y ligero de la coci: A refreshing and light Italian dish that combines fresh tomatoes, buffalo mozzarella, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. It is perfect as an appetizer or side dish, with a perfect balance of freshness and flavor.
Un delicioso postre que combina crepes f: A delicious dessert that combines thin and soft crepes with a melted chocolate filling, accompanied by fresh and juicy strawberries. This mix of sweet and fresh flavors creates an irresistible dish, perfect for a special snack or to surprise on any occasion.
Pollo Asado con Limón y Tomillo: Roast Chicken with Lemon and Thyme
Esta receta simple de pollo asado al hor: This simple oven-roasted chicken recipe with lemon, thyme, and a touch of olive oil is perfect for a light and flavorful spring meal.
Esta sopa tradicional española es ideal: This traditional Spanish soup is perfect for the heat of spring and summer. It is made with ripe tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, garlic, and bread, all blended and served well chilled. It is refreshing and full of flavor.
El ruibarbo es un ingrediente que aparec: Rhubarb is a springtime ingredient, and when combined with strawberries in a homemade tart, it creates a delicious dessert that is slightly tangy and sweet—perfect for springtime treats.
Un desayuno sin gluten, nutritivo y deli: A gluten-free, nutritious, and delicious breakfast. Made with ripe bananas, gluten-free oat flour, egg, and a touch of cinnamon. They are soft, fluffy, and perfect with honey or fresh fruit.
Una opción ligera y saludable que combin: A light and healthy option that combines cooked quinoa with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, feta cheese, and a lemon dressing. It is refreshing, filling, and completely gluten-free.
Para los amantes de la pizza sin gluten,: For gluten-free pizza lovers, this version uses a crust made with shredded cauliflower, cheese, and egg. It is baked until crispy and topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and your favorite ingredients.
Un delicioso brownie hecho con cacao pur: A delicious brownie made with pure cocoa, ground almonds, and a hint of vanilla. It is dense, moist, and perfectly chocolatey—ideal for gluten-free dessert lovers.

Espaguetis, aceite de oliva, ajo, guindi: Spaghetti, olive oil, garlic, chili pepper, fresh parsley, salt, and pepper
Cocina los espaguetis según las indicaci: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, heat olive oil and add the chopped garlic along with the chili pepper. Cook over medium heat until the garlic is golden. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet, mix well, sprinkle with chopped parsley, and adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper. Serve hot and enjoy.
Pechuga de pollo, piña, achiote, ajo, ce: Chicken breast, pineapple, achiote, garlic, onion, corn tortillas, cilantro, lime, salt, and pepper.
Marinar el pollo con achiote, ajo, cebol: Marinate the chicken with achiote, garlic, onion, pineapple, salt, and pepper. Cook the chicken in a skillet until golden and fully cooked. Slice into strips and serve in warm corn tortillas. Top with fresh cilantro and a squeeze of lime to taste.
Tomates maduros, mozzarella fresca, alba: Ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Corta los tomates y la mozzarella en rod: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella. Alternate a slice of tomato, a slice of mozzarella, and a few basil leaves on a plate. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Muslos de pollo (o pechugas), limón, tom: Chicken thighs (or breasts), lemon, fresh thyme, olive oil, minced garlic, salt, pepper, potatoes (optional).
Precalienta el horno a 200°C. Coloca los: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Place the chicken thighs on a baking tray and drizzle with olive oil. Squeeze the lemon juice over the chicken and place lemon slices on top. Add the thyme and minced garlic. Season with salt and pepper. If desired, add chopped potatoes to the tray. Bake for 40-45 minutes until the chicken is golden and fully cooked. Serve hot with the potatoes.
Tomates maduros, pepino, pimiento verde,: Ripe tomatoes, cucumber, green bell pepper, small onion, garlic clove, bread (optional), white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt, pepper, cold water (optional).
Lava y trocea los tomates, pepino (pelad: Wash and chop the tomatoes, peeled cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic. If desired, soak the slice of bread in water. Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Add the vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper. If the soup is too thick, add cold water until you reach the desired consistency. Refrigerate for 1-2 hours and serve well chilled. You can accompany it with croutons.
Quinoa, tomates cherry, pepino, cebolla: Quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, black olives, feta cheese, fresh basil, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Cocina la quinoa según las indicaciones: Cook the quinoa according to the package instructions. Let it cool. Meanwhile, cut the cherry tomatoes in half, dice the cucumber, and slice the red onion thinly. Crumble the feta cheese into small pieces. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa with the tomatoes, cucumber, onion, olives, and feta cheese. Add torn fresh basil leaves. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, and pepper. Pour the vinaigrette over the salad, mix well, and serve chilled.
Coliflor, huevo, queso rallado (mozzarel: Cauliflower, egg, grated cheese (mozzarella or parmesan), garlic powder, oregano, salt, pepper, tomato sauce, topping ingredients (ham, mushrooms, peppers, etc.).
Precalienta el horno a 200°C. Ralla la c: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Grate the cauliflower and steam it for 5-7 minutes. Drain well to remove excess water. Mix the cooked cauliflower with the egg, grated cheese, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper. Form a base on a baking tray lined with parchment paper. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. Add tomato sauce and your favorite toppings. Bake for another 5-10 minutes until the cheese melts. Serve hot.
Harina, huevo, leche, mantequilla, choco: Flour, egg, milk, butter, dark chocolate, strawberries, sugar.
Mezcla la harina, huevo, leche y mantequ: Mix the flour, egg, milk, and butter to make the crepe batter. Cook in a pan with a bit of oil. Melt the chocolate and cover the crepes with it. Add sliced strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. Serve hot.
Ruibarbo, fresas, azúcar, esencia de vai: Rhubarb, strawberries, sugar, vanilla extract, shortcrust pastry, egg.
Cocina el ruibarbo con azúcar y vainilla: Cook the rhubarb with sugar and vanilla. Add the strawberries and let cool. Place the shortcrust pastry in a baking dish and pour in the mixture. Brush the edges with egg and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30-35 minutes. Let cool before serving.
Plátano, avena (sin gluten), huevo, lech: Banana, gluten-free oats, egg, milk, cinnamon, vanilla extract.
Tritura el plátano y mézclalo con la ave: Mash the banana and mix it with the oats, egg, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Cook in a non-stick pan until golden on both sides. Serve with honey or fruits.
chocolate negro, mantequilla, azúcar, hu: Dark chocolate, butter, sugar, egg, almonds, cocoa powder, salt.
Derrite el chocolate con mantequilla. Me: Melt the chocolate with butter. Mix with sugar, egg, almonds, cocoa, and a pinch of salt. Pour into a baking pan and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20-25 minutes. Let cool and cut into portions.
